reporter_caption.center: COMMONWEALTH ex rel. TIMPERIO v. TIMPERIO, 225 Pa. Super. 799 (1973)

caption.center: Commonwealth ex rel. Timperio v. Timperio, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Nonsupport. Before RUFE, III, J. Appeal, No. 871, Oct. T., 1972, from order of Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County, Jan. T., 1972, No. 109. Submitted March 22, 1973.
